1. Introduction¶

TPPS is a Drupal module built to extend the functionality of the Tripal toolset. The purpose of the module is to present users with an easy-to-use method of uploading data from association genetics experiments to the CHADO database schema. This module requires the following Tripal modules:

  1. Tripal (v3.x)
  2. Tripal Chado
  3. Tripal Jobs
  4. Tripal Jobs Daemon
  5. Ultimate Cron

Tripal Plant PopGen Submit
